name: RIO_W4R TXURISM 01
description:
17,650 people have been registered as dead by the state of Rio de Janeiro from 2003 to date. In July 2019 there was a record. 195 in a single month.

This audio was taken from a police operation in the Favela City of God. In addition to the samba, the beach and the wonderful people, we are at war.
The drug trade gained weapons of war through the corruption of the armed forces since the 1964 dictatorship.

While we are dying, there are still some fascists who are calling for the return of a military regime.

As Paulo Cesar Pinheiro said:
I'm not from the time of guns
That's why I still prefer
listening to a samba verse
Than listening to gunfire.
(Nomes de favela, recorded in 2003)
